awards:
第68届戛纳电影节(2015)
　　一种关注单元 一种关注大奖(提名) 戴维·巴勃罗斯

　　第31届西班牙戈雅奖(2017)
　　最佳伊比利亚美洲电影(提名) 戴维·巴勃罗斯

　　第63届圣塞巴斯蒂安国际电影节(2015)
　　地平线大奖(提名) 戴维·巴勃罗斯

writer.name: 戴维·巴勃罗斯 David Pablos

director.name: 戴维·巴勃罗斯 David Pablos

introduction: “The Chosen Ones” turns on 15-year-old, Ulises, who is being groomed by his father to enamor young girls, tricking them into prostitution. But he falls in love with Sofia, his first victim, who’s just 14. To save her, his father demands he seduces a second girl, entangling Ulises in the world of juvenile prostitution that he was trying to avoid, from which escape come at a very high price.
